entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text: @EliStokols @PressSec Because we never managed the first wave… “reopening”… as Trump and others want it… won’t work… it’s going to backfire… it already is… Coronavirus will chase people back indoors… we need to look more at long term restructuring.. rather than a 'flip the switch' reopening…
